00054     CameraManager::CameraManager (const String& SceneManagerName, World* world) : ManagerBase(world)
00055     {
00056         this->SceneManager = Ogre::Root::getSingleton().getSceneManager(SceneManagerName);
00057         this->DefaultCamera = NULL;
00058         this->ONodes=0;
00059         this->SNodes=0;
00060         this->Priority = -20;
00061     }
00062 
00063     CameraManager::~CameraManager ()
00064     {
00065         if(NULL!=DefaultCamera)
00066         {
00067             delete DefaultCamera;
00068         }
00069         while(!Cameras.empty())
00070         {
00071             Cameras.pop_back();
00072         }
00073         while(!Nodes.empty())
00074         {
00075             Nodes.pop_back();
00076         }
00077     }
00078 
00079     Ogre::Camera* CameraManager::FindCamera(String Name)
00080     {
00081         for( std::vector<Ogre::Camera*>::iterator c=Cameras.begin(); c!=Cameras.end(); c++ )
00082         {
00083             if ( Name == (*c)->getName() )
00084             {
00085                 return *c;
00086             }
00087         }
00088         return NULL;
00089     }
00090 
00091     Ogre::SceneNode* CameraManager::FindNode(String Name)
00092     {
00093         for( std::vector<Ogre::SceneNode*>::iterator c=Nodes.begin(); c!=Nodes.end(); c++ )
00094         {
00095             if ( Name == (*c)->getName() )
00096             {
00097                 return *c;
00098             }
00099         }
00100         return NULL;
00101     }

00103     String CameraManager::CreateCamera ()
00104     {
00105         if(NULL==DefaultCamera)
00106         {
00107             String Name="DefaultCamera";
00108             this->DefaultCamera = this->SceneManager->createCamera(Name);
00109             return Name;
00110         }
00111         std::stringstream namemaker;
00112         String Name="Camera";
00113         namemaker << Name << Cameras.size()+1;
00114         Ogre::Camera* tempcam = this->SceneManager->createCamera(namemaker.str());
00115         Cameras.push_back(tempcam);
00116         return namemaker.str();
00117     }
00118 
00119     Camera* CameraManager::CreateCameraPtr ()
00120     {
00121         if(NULL==DefaultCamera)
00122         {
00123             String Name="DefaultCamera";
00124             this->DefaultCamera = this->SceneManager->createCamera(Name);
00125             Camera* tempptr = new Camera(DefaultCamera, this);
00126             return tempptr;
00127         }
00128         std::stringstream namemaker;
00129         String Name="Camera";
00130         namemaker << Name << Cameras.size()+1;
00131         Ogre::Camera* tempcam = this->SceneManager->createCamera(namemaker.str());
00132         Cameras.push_back(tempcam);
00133         Camera* tempptr = new Camera(tempcam, this);
00134         return tempptr;
00135     }
00136 
00137     String CameraManager::CreateOrbitingNode (Vector3 Target, Vector3 RelativeLoc)
00138     {
00139         std::stringstream namemaker1;
00140         String Name1="OrbitingNode";
00141         this->ONodes++;
00142         namemaker1 << Name1 << ONodes;
00143         Ogre::SceneNode* orbitingnode = this->SceneManager->createSceneNode(namemaker1.str());
00144         Nodes.push_back(orbitingnode);
00145         //creation
00146         std::stringstream namemaker2;
00147         String Name2="CenterNode";
00148         namemaker2 << Name2 << ONodes;
00149         Ogre::SceneNode* centernode = this->SceneManager->createSceneNode(namemaker2.str());
00150         Nodes.push_back(centernode);
00151         //placement
00152         this->SceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(centernode);
00153         centernode->addChild(orbitingnode);
00154         centernode->setPosition(Target.GetOgreVector3());
00155         orbitingnode->setPosition(RelativeLoc.GetOgreVector3());
00156         orbitingnode->setAutoTracking(true, centernode);
00157         return namemaker1.str();
00158     }
00159 
00160     String CameraManager::CreateStandNode (Vector3 LookAt, Vector3 Location)
00161     {
00162         std::stringstream namemaker;
00163         String Name="StandNode";
00164         this->SNodes++;
00165         namemaker << Name << SNodes;
00166         Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = this->SceneManager->createSceneNode(namemaker.str());
00167         this->SceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(tempnode);
00168         tempnode->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00169         tempnode->lookAt(LookAt.GetOgreVector3(), Ogre::Node::TS_WORLD);
00170         Nodes.push_back(tempnode);
00171         return namemaker.str();
00172     }
00173 
00174     void CameraManager::ClearNodes ()
00175     {
00176         Ogre::SceneNode* Node = NULL;
00177         for( std::vector< Ogre::SceneNode* >::iterator it = Nodes.begin() ; it != Nodes.end() ; it++ )
00178         {
00179             Node = (*it);
00180             SceneManager->destroySceneNode(Node);
00181             Nodes.erase(it);
00182         }
00183         return;
00184     }
00185 
00186     void CameraManager::ClearCameras ()
00187     {
00188         Ogre::Camera* Camera = NULL;
00189         for( std::vector< Ogre::Camera* >::iterator it = Cameras.begin() ; it != Cameras.end() ; it++ )
00190         {
00191             Camera = (*it);
00192             SceneManager->destroyCamera(Camera);
00193             Cameras.erase(it);
00194         }
00195         return;
00196     }

00198     void CameraManager::SetLocation (Vector3 Location, String Name)
00199     {
00200         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00201         {
00202             this->DefaultCamera->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00203             return;
00204         }
00205         Ogre::Camera* tempptr = FindCamera(Name);
00206         tempptr->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00207         return;
00208     }

00306     void CameraManager::SetAutoTracking (bool Enabled, String Target, Vector3 Offset, String Name)
00307     {
00308         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00309         {
00310             Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = FindNode(Target);
00311             this->DefaultCamera->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt, Offset.GetOgreVector3());
00312             return;
00313         }
00314         Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = FindNode(Target);
00315         Ogre::Camera* tempptr = FindCamera(Name);
00316         tempptr->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt, Offset.GetOgreVector3());
00317         return;
00318     }
00319 
00320     void CameraManager::SetAutoTracking (bool Enabled, String Target, String Name)
00321     {
00322         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00323         {
00324             Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = FindNode(Target);
00325             this->DefaultCamera->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt);
00326             return;
00327         }
00328         Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = FindNode(Target);
00329         Ogre::Camera* tempptr = FindCamera(Name);
00330         tempptr->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt);
00331         return;
00332     }

00334     Ray CameraManager::GetCameraToViewportRay (Real Screenx, Real Screeny, String Name)
00335     {
00336         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00337         {
00338             Ray R(this->DefaultCamera->getCameraToViewportRay(Screenx, Screeny));
00339             return R;
00340         }
00341         Ogre::Camera* tempcam = FindCamera(Name);
00342         Ray R(tempcam->getCameraToViewportRay(Screenx, Screeny));
00343         return R;
00344     }

00346     String CameraManager::GetNodeAttachedToCamera (String Name)
00347     {
00348         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00349         {
00350             Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = this->DefaultCamera->getParentSceneNode();
00351             return tempnode->getName();
00352         }
00353         Ogre::Camera* tempcam = FindCamera(Name);
00354         Ogre::SceneNode *tempnode = tempcam->getParentSceneNode();
00355         return tempnode->getName();
00356     }

00358     Vector3 CameraManager::GetNodeLocation (String Name)
00359     {
00360         Ogre::SceneNode* tempptr = FindNode(Name);
00361         Vector3 nodeloc;
00362         nodeloc.ExtractOgreVector3(tempptr->getPosition());
00363         return nodeloc;
00364     }

00390     void CameraManager::ZoomCamera(Real Zoom, String Name)
00391     {
00392         Ogre::Vector3 zoomlevel(0,0,Zoom);
00393         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00394         {
00395             this->DefaultCamera->moveRelative(zoomlevel);
00396             return;
00397         }
00398         Ogre::Camera* tempptr = FindCamera(Name);
00399         tempptr->moveRelative(zoomlevel);
00400         return;
00401     }
00402 
00403     void CameraManager::ResetZoom (String Name)
00404     {
00405         Ogre::Vector3 loc;
00406         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00407         {
00408             loc = this->DefaultCamera->getPosition();
00409             Real zoom=loc.z;
00410             zoom=0-zoom;
00411             this->DefaultCamera->moveRelative(Ogre::Vector3(0,0,zoom));
00412             return;
00413         }
00414         Ogre::Camera* tempptr = FindCamera(Name);
00415         loc = tempptr->getPosition();
00416         Real zoom=loc.z;
00417         zoom=0-zoom;
00418         tempptr->moveRelative(Ogre::Vector3(0,0,zoom));
00419         return;
00420     }
00421 
00422     void CameraManager::AttachCameraToNode (String NodeName, String CamName)
00423     {
00424         Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = FindNode(NodeName);
00425         if(CamName=="DefaultCamera")
00426         {
00427             tempnode->attachObject(this->DefaultCamera);
00428         }else{
00429             Ogre::Camera* tempcam = FindCamera(CamName);
00430             tempnode->attachObject(tempcam);
00431         }
00432 
00433         return;
00434     }
00435 
00436     void CameraManager::DetachCameraFromNode (String NodeName, String CamName)
00437     {
00438         Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = FindNode(NodeName);
00439         Ogre::Camera* tempcam = FindCamera(CamName);
00440         tempnode->detachObject(tempcam);
00441         return;
00442     }

00444     void CameraManager::IncrementYOrbit (Real Radian, String Name)
00445     {
00446         Ogre::Radian Rad(Radian);
00447         Ogre::SceneNode* tempptr = FindNode(Name);
00448         tempptr->getParentSceneNode()->yaw(Rad);
00449     }
